author: Allen Powers
comment: So far so good and very handy. I live in a rural area and my signal changes at times. Thank you for this!

author: Brian Calderon
comment: I enjoy these notifications; but all I want is them to automatically dismiss after a few seconds!!!
title: Automatic dismiss

author: Bikram Agarwal
comment: First time it showed up on my watch was almost 3 days after installation. Even then, it kept showing my cell network strength as emergency only. And it never notifies me when my WiFi disconnects.

reply.author: Dennis Mantz
reply.content: Hi Bikram, thanks for this report. I'm trying to fix those bugs.. could you please send me the log of the application? This would help me a lot locating your specific issues. There are to menu actions in the smartphone app 'show handheld log' and 'show wearable log'. Thanks for your help! Cheers Dennis

title: Buggy

author: Lee White
comment: App keeps crashing on me about 15 times a day or worse. Some times it locks up my lg g watch r and I have to totally reboot it. I have a Samsung Galaxy Note 3 with android 5.0.1 and running 5.1.1 on my watch.
title: Buggy

author: Richard A
comment: I have an lg g watch and the app will not show and notifications.  Maybe the next version.

reply.author: Dennis Mantz
reply.content: Hi Richard, I'm sorry that it's not working for you. Maybe we can find the issue. I tested the app on an LG G watch and a Nexus 5. It worked just fine. Please note that the Android system needs about 1 to 5 minutes after the installation before the app is finally pushed to the watch. Could you please contact me by mail (dennis.mantz@googlemail.com)

title: Great idea, wish it worked
